title: Got given incorrect ranked border.
body:
So i finished plat 5 at the end of the season, and was give a gold 1 border.

Proof: http://i.imgur.com/w9LLRvV.png
From the PBE: http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8DdGIwl4UBU/Vj_zYUOmHjI/AAAAAAAAIDM/d-ee60X0xok/s1600/gold.jpg

Has this happened to anyone else?

replies.body:
The border you are currently seeing is your rank from 2014 season, it just looks different because of the new border design that was added with the patch today.

Your 2015 season rewards, including your current ranked border, will be distributed sometime between now and the 17th of November.
Dw this has happened to me as well.
